item.title: Pair Programming vs Code Reviews: Why Both Matter
item.description: Exploring why pair programming and code reviews are complementary practices, not mutually exclusive alternatives.

item.title: The Psychology of Code Reviews: Why Line Count Matters
item.description: A humorous yet insightful look at how the number of lines in a code review affects thoroughness and attention to detail.
